item.description:
Last Mass Networking until September at Dedham Summer Shack! And with good weather, should be over 60 Attending This Month!!

  *Come Meet and Network with Other Professionals and then Watch Red Sox/Twins Baseball Game*

  Bring some business cards, a smile, and a professional attitude because it's time to make some valuable new business contacts in 2013. Dress code is business casual

  (Free Appetizers and Plenty of Parking in the Rear at Great Location, Just off 128 on Rte. 1 North Go past Elm St and take Right onto Legacy Blvd and left into Parking Lot)


  [Get Advance Tickets Now at http://massnetworking0506.eventbrite.com]

Only $5, $8 Cash at the Door if Available

  *Doing a Charity Raffle with chance to win Vendor Booths at Crackerbarrel Fairgrounds and Membership for Barter Connections (Valued at $395)!  Proceeds going to Sandy Hook Scholarships and are $5/entry*

  Raffles are Sponsored by http://BestNetShopping.com (Over 4000 Stores/Websites like Groupon, Sears, Pet Smart, Lowes, Home Depot, Angie's List and more with up to 50% Cash Back on Purchases) & http://Website-Business-Solutions.com (Up to 75% off on Top Notch Websites with E-Commerce and SEO) Check them out and Save!
item.name: *Last Mass Networking in Dedham of the Season* (50+ Expected)
